info.description: API for querying information about Assertoor tests
info.title: Assertoor API Documentation

get.description: Returns the list of configured consensus and execution layer clients with their current status.
Returns the names of all configured global variables. Values are not included as they may contain sensitive data.
Returns application-level logs from the coordinator. Protected endpoint - requires authentication unless auth is disabled.

parameters.description: Log index to start from (0 for all)
parameters.name: since

get.description: Returns a single task descriptor by name with its JSON schema

parameters.description: Task name
parameters.name: name

get.description: Returns a list of all available task descriptors with their JSON schemas
Returns the test definition with given ID.
get.summary: Get test definition by test ID

parameters.description: ID of the test definition to get details for
parameters.name: testId

get.description: Returns the full YAML source for a test definition. For API-registered tests, returns the stored YAML. For external tests referenced by file/URL, loads and returns the content from the original source. Requires authentication as YAML may contain sensitive configuration.
get.summary: Get test YAML source by test ID

parameters.description: ID of the test definition to get YAML for
parameters.name: testId

get.description: Returns the run details with given ID. Includes a summary and a list of task with limited details
get.summary: Get test run by run ID

parameters.description: ID of the test run to get details for
parameters.name: runId

post.description: Returns the test/run id & status of the cancelled test.
post.summary: Cancel test run by test ID

parameters.description: ID of the test run to cancel
parameters.name: runId

parameters.description: Test cancellation options
parameters.name: cancelOptions

get.description: Returns the run details with given ID. Includes a summary and a list of task with all details (incl. logs & task configurations)
get.summary: Get detailed test run by run ID

parameters.description: ID of the test run to get details for
parameters.name: runId

get.description: Returns the run status with given ID.
get.summary: Get test run status by run ID

parameters.description: ID of the test run to get the status for
parameters.name: runId

get.description: Returns the task details with given run ID and task index. Includes full log, configuration and result variables (unless security trimmed).
get.summary: Get detailed task of a given test run

parameters.description: ID of the test run
parameters.name: runId

parameters.description: Index of the task to get details for
parameters.name: taskIndex

get.description: Returns a specific result file from a task. Requires authentication as results may contain sensitive data.

parameters.description: ID of the test run
parameters.name: runId

parameters.description: ID of the task
parameters.name: taskId

parameters.description: Type of file to return (summary, result, ...)
parameters.name: resultType

parameters.description: Index or name of the result file
parameters.name: fileId

get.description: Returns a list of all test runs.

parameters.description: Return test runs for this test ID only
parameters.name: test_id

parameters.description: Test configuration (json or yaml)
parameters.name: testConfig

post.description: Returns the test & run id of the scheduled test execution.
post.summary: Schedule new test run by test ID

parameters.description: Rest run options
parameters.name: runOptions

get.description: Returns the list of test definitions. These test definitions can be used to create new test runs and are supplied via the assertoor configuration.

parameters.description: Test configuration (json or yaml)
parameters.name: testConfig

post.description: Returns the test id and name of the added test.
post.summary: Register new test via yaml configuration

parameters.description: Test configuration (json or yaml)
parameters.name: testConfig

post.description: Returns the test id and name of the added test.
post.summary: Register new test via external test configuration

parameters.description: Test configuration (json or yaml)
parameters.name: externalTestConfig

vars.description: Config with global vars merged in

tags.description: All endpoints related to test definitions
tags.name: Test

tags.description: All endpoints related to test runs
tags.name: TestRun
